DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this pilot study is to characterize the profile of lipoprotein, inflammatory, and metabolic markers of cardiovascular disease in obese adolescents as compared to normal-weight age-matched controls.
DOC.brief_title: Characterization of Dyslipidemia in Adolescent Obesity
DOC.criteria: Age 1319 BMI â‰¥25 (obese) or <25 (normal weight) Prior diagnosis of any eating disorder (e.g. anorexia or bulimia) Prior diagnosis of any congenital lipid disorder (e.g. familial hypercholesterolemia) Current use (or within past 6 months) of any lipid altering medications
